participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Curious and thoughtful, Liam enjoys exploring new ideas and is open to trying unconventional things.
participant_1.background: I remember falling asleep in the back of my dad's pickup truck on the way to the beach. I'm a vegan and I hope to become a doctor one day. I want to find out what it's like to eat grasshoppers. I grew up with my family, and we've always been close.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, Sophie loves to express herself and enjoys new experiences.
participant_2.background: My family is supportive of my career and enjoys vacationing with me. I have pink hair. I've never been in a fight, but I have been warned for riding my horse too fast. My favorite book is Ender's Game. My worst moment was when my salon was robbed.

content.text: Hi, thanks for asking. Ender's Game is my favorite book.
Wow, I've heard of that before. What's it about?
It's about a boy who is recruited to fight an alien race. He's very young and has a lot of pressure on him.
That sounds like a good book. I may have to check it out.
I think you would like it. What's your favorite book?
I don't know if I have a favorite book. I like a lot of different books.
What are some of your favorites?
I like the Harry Potter series. I also like The Hunger Games series.
I've heard good things about the Harry Potter series. I've never read any of them though.
You should read them! They're really good.
I might have to check them out.
You should. You won't regret it.
